trial_identification.scientific_title: Behavioral analysis of preterm neonates included in a tactile and kinesthetic stimulation program during hospitalization in preterm neonates
trial_identification.public_title: Tactile and kinesthetic stimulation program during hospitalization and behavioral analysis in preterm neonates

primary_sponsor.name: Universidade de São Paulo
primary_sponsor.address: Rua Prof. Mello Moraes, 1721 Cidade Universitaria Sao Paulo, SP, CEP 055508-900

secondary_sponsor.name: Andreia Menandro Ferreira
secondary_sponsor.address: Rua Cônego Valadão, 1539, apt 53 Gopouva, Guarulhos, SP, CEP 07040-000

source_support.name: Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Cientifico e Tecnologico
source_support.address: SEPN 507 Ed. CNPq - Terreo - Sala 7 Brasília, DF, CEP 70740-901

interventions.freetext: Stable preterm neonates received tactile and kinesthetic stimulation during hospitalization; by trained author and mothers. With ligth touch and arms and legs mobilization; during 5 to 15 minutes daily, since preterm was clinically stable until hospital discharge.
